item.title: Lauren (SnShne322) add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lauren (SnShne322) add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "I love books, by the way, way more than movies. Movies tell you what to think. A good book lets you choose a few thoughts for yourself." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Lauren (SnShne322) add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "When the day shall come that we do part," he said softly, and turned to look at me, "if my last words are not 'I love you'-ye'll ken it was because I didna have time." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Lauren (SnShne322) add a quote by Paullina Simons
item.description: "A bus came. The soldier turned away from her and walked toward it. Tatiana watched him. Even his walk was from another world; the step was too sure, the stride too long, yet somehow it all seemed right, looked right, felt right. It was like stumbling on a book you thought you had lost. Ah, yes, there it is." -- Paullina Simons
